mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT (COMMENT_CONTENT, POST_ID, MEMBER_ID) VALUES(#{commentContent}, #{postId}, #{memberId})
INSERT INTO COMMENT (COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DEPTH, PARENT_COMMENT_ID, POST_ID, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (#{commentContent}, 1, #{parentCommentId}, #{postId}, #{memberId})
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment_CONTENT = #{commentContent}, comment_UPDATED_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT RE.ID, RE.COMMENT_CONTENT, RE.COMMENT_DATE, RE.COMMENT_UPDATED_TIME, RE.COMMENT_DEPTH, RE.PARENT_COMMENT_ID, RE.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, RE.POST_ID FROM COMMENT RE JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON M.ID = RE.MEMBER_ID WHERE RE.POST_ID = #{id} ORDER BY RE.PARENT_COMMENT_ID ASC, RE.COMMENT_DEPTH ASC, RE.ID ASC LIMIT #{pagination.rowCount} OFFSET (#{pagination.page} - 1) * #{pagination.rowCount}

SELECT c.id, c.post_id AS postId, c.member_id AS memberId, m.member_name AS memberName, c.comment_content AS commentContent, c.comment_date AS commentDate, c.parent_comment_id AS parentCommentId, c.comment_depth AS commentDepth FROM comment c JOIN tbl_member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.parent_comment_id ASC, c.comment_date ASC
